thread.section_title: Peters Flowers Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Peters Flowers | www.petersflowers.com
thread.title: Laura S.
thread.title_full: Peters Flowers reviewed by Laura S.

author: Laura S.
title: Laura S.
text: I made this order from out-of-state, relying only on location and online reviews. So really, this was a leap of faith. The flowers were delivered within two hours of my order and my daughter loved them. She immediately sent a photo along with an excited thank you text that brimmed with enthusiasm. The arrangement was lovely. The whole process was next to effortless and the results were better than expected.
